IMPPP

MODULE IMPPP-SYNTAX

SYNTAX AExp ::= Id
| Int
| AExp / AExp [ prec(31), superheat, strict ]
| AExp + AExp [ prec(33), superheat, strict ]
| ( AExp )

SYNTAX BExp ::= Bool
| AExp <= AExp [ prec(37), seqstrict ]
| not BExp [ prec(53), strict ]
| BExp and BExp [ prec(55), strict(1) ]
| ( BExp )

SYNTAX Stmt ::= skip
| var Ids [ prec(70) ]
| print ( AExps ) [ strict ]
| halt
| Id := AExp [ prec(80), strict(2) ]
| if BExp then Stmt else Stmt [ prec(85), strict(1) ]
| while BExp do Stmt [ prec(85) ]
| spawn Stmt [ prec(90) ]
| Stmt ; Stmt [ prec(100) ]
| ( Stmt )
| { }
| { Stmt } [ gather(&) ]

SYNTAX Ids ::= List{#Id,","} [ strict ]

SYNTAX AExp ::= String
| ++ Id [ prec(0) ]
| read ( )

SYNTAX AExps ::= List{#AExp,","}

END MODULE
